section.title: Disable Kudzu
section.para:
Kudzu is Red Hat’s hardware configuration daemon. The daemon allows anyone with console access to reconfigure the system’s hardware without authentication.
Kudzu
console
The use of any system configuration tool that does not require prior authentication is strongly discouraged.
